$interpreted: : A year earlier...
Lazer: Huff...puff...God damn...*gasp*...almost...there.
Sun Soldier: Blood! Lazer, you're injured!
Lazer: *tsk*...no wonder it hurts this bad.
Sun Soldier: Don't move! We'll get the medic, wait here!
Lazer: It's nothing, I can handle——
Sun Soldier: You're the best soldier we've got, we can't let you get injured!
Lazer: Best soldier? Sounds pretty good...
Lazer: My home...the Kingdom of the Sun...where is it? It's too far to even see...
Captain: Hey! It's time to prepare for battle! What the hell are you guys chatting about!?
Sun Soldier: Captain, sir! We're afraid Lazer is injured. The medic said it's minor, but he doesn't look so well.
Sun Soldier: He didn't eat anything at dinner and he's just sitting by the campfire alone...
Captain: ——Is he alone now?
Sun Soldier: Yes sir, what's wrong?
Captain: Damn! Not again!!
Sun Soldier: Huh? Where are you going? Captain!?
Lazer: My legs aren't working...
Lazer: Damn! I tried to make it look too real...
Lazer: If I don't move faster...
Captain: Lazer Bernard, I command you to stop! We do not tolerate deserters!
Captain: You've been caught how many times now? Do you want to die?
Captain: If you weren't such a good fighter, I'd have killed you a long time ago! Do you have any love for your country!?
Lazer: ...Which country?
Lazer: ——You mean the one that forces its peasants to join the army and put them on the front lines with terrible equipment!?
Lazer: Look at them! Look at me!
Lazer: No fancy armor, a shortage of food supplies, if I don't desert than I'm just waiting to die!!
Captain: You selfish prick! If everyone thought like this, the Kingdom of the Sun would have been destroyed long ago!
Captain: Your mother and father didn't raise you correctly. It's time for me to teach you a lesson!
Lazer: No...this can't be!!
Captain: Huh? That's strange...eh!?
Sun Soldier: Liz-Liz-Lizards! It's an ambush!
Sun Soldier: Run!!!!!
Sun Soldier: WAHHHH!!! I don't want to die! Please, all of you. Protect me! Don't hurt me!
